snippet.title: Beloved Rapture - Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Excited to share what we've been working on!
The release date looks to be on the horizon for 2024!

Play the demo: http://https://store.steampowered.com/app/2017620/Beloved_Rapture/

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/BelovedRapture

Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/belovedrapture
Instagram: https://instagram.com/beloved_rapture/

Links: http://BelovedRapture.info 

---

Beloved Rapture is an indie JRPG, blending modern themes with classic gameplay.

Characters must challenge not only the next looming dungeon boss—but themselves, and their own demons.

Navigate a vast 16-bit world, ripe for exploration. Jump, swim, climb, or ride a dragon through the air to solve puzzles and discover new locations filled with hidden treasure, secrets, and much more.

#GameDev #Gaming #IndieDev #Indiegames #snes !6bit #pixelart #pixelartgames #retrogaming
